CN.content:
Please identify the "Material Name" entities in the following paragraph.

Paragraph: Bulk heterojunction solar cells were fabricated with configuration of ITO / PEDOT : PSS / polymer : PC71BM / TiO x / Al.

Let's think step by step.

1. ITO: Indium Tin Oxide
2. PEDOT : PSS: Poly(3,4-ethylenedioxythiophene):poly(styrenesulfonate)
3. polymer: Unspecified type of polymer, not named in the text
4. PC71BM: [6,6]-Phenyl-C71-butyric acid methyl ester
5. TiO x: Titanium Oxide
6. Al: Aluminum.
Please remove irrelevant entities and only keep the entities that clearly refer to Material Name.

1. ITO: Indium Tin Oxide
2. PEDOT : PSS: Poly(3,4-ethylenedioxythiophene):poly(styrenesulfonate)
3. PC71BM: [6,6]-Phenyl-C71-butyric acid methyl ester
4. TiO x: Titanium Oxide.

These are the entities in the paragraph that can be clearly identified as material names.

Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Material Name".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

| Material Name |
| --- |
| Indium Tin Oxide (ITO) |
| Poly(3,4-ethylenedioxythiophene):poly(styrenesulfonate) (PEDOT : PSS) |
| [6,6]-Phenyl-C71-butyric acid methyl ester (PC71BM) |
| Titanium Oxide (TiO x) |

PN.content:
Please identify the "Property Name" entities in the following paragraph.

Paragraph: Bulk heterojunction solar cells were fabricated with configuration of ITO / PEDOT : PSS / polymer : PC71BM / TiO x / Al.

Let's think step by step.

1. ITO: Indium Tin Oxide
2. PEDOT : PSS: Poly(3,4-ethylenedioxythiophene): Poly(styrenesulfonate)
3. polymer: Unspecified type of polymer used in the solar cell
4. PC71BM: Poly[2-methoxy-5-(2-ethylhexyloxy)-1,4-phenylenevinylene]
5. TiO x: Titanium Oxide
6. Al: Aluminum.

1. ITO: Indium Tin Oxide (conductive material)
2. PEDOT : PSS: Poly(3,4-ethylenedioxythiophene): Poly(styrenesulfonate) (conductive polymer)
3. polymer: Unspecified type of polymer (material)
4. PC71BM: Poly[2-methoxy-5-(2-ethylhexyloxy)-1,4-phenylenevinylene] (organic semiconductor material)
5. TiO x: Titanium Oxide (insulating material)

Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Property Name".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

| Property Name |
| --- |
| Indium Tin Oxide (ITO) |
| Poly(3,4-ethylenedioxythiophene): Poly(styrenesulfonate) (PEDOT : PSS) |
| Unspecified type of polymer |
| Poly[2-methoxy-5-(2-ethylhexyloxy)-1,4-phenylenevinylene] (PC71BM) |
| Titanium Oxide (TiO x) |

PV.content:
Please identify the "Property Value" entities in the following paragraph.

Paragraph: Bulk heterojunction solar cells were fabricated with configuration of ITO / PEDOT : PSS / polymer : PC71BM / TiO x / Al.

Let's think step by step.

1. ITO: Indium Tin Oxide - a type of conductive oxide material.
2. PEDOT : PSS: Poly(3,4-ethylenedioxythiophene): Poly(styrenesulfonate) - a conducting polymer.
3. polymer: Unspecified type of polymer used in the fabrication of the solar cells.
4. PC71BM: Poly[2-methoxy-5-(2-ethylhexyloxy)-1,4-phenylenevinylene] - a type of organic semiconductor material.
5. TiO x: Titanium Oxide - a type of oxide material.
6. Al: Aluminum - a type of metal.

So, the property value entities in the paragraph are: Indium Tin Oxide, Poly(3,4-ethylenedioxythiophene): Poly(styrenesulfonate), Poly[2-methoxy-5-(2-ethylhexyloxy)-1,4-phenylenevinylene], Titanium Oxide, and Aluminum.
Please remove irrelevant entities and only keep the entities that clearly refer to Value of Material Property.

The entities that clearly refer to the value of material properties in the paragraph are:

1. ITO: Indium Tin Oxide - a type of conductive oxide material.
2. PEDOT : PSS: Poly(3,4-ethylenedioxythiophene): Poly(styrenesulfonate) - a conducting polymer.
3. PC71BM: Poly[2-methoxy-5-(2-ethylhexyloxy)-1,4-phenylenevinylene] - a type of organic semiconductor material.

These entities represent the specific materials used in the fabrication of the bulk heterojunction solar cells, and their inclusion in the paragraph implies certain material properties relevant to the solar cell fabrication process.

Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Property Value".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

| Property Value |
| --- |
| Indium Tin Oxide (ITO) |
| Poly(3,4-ethylenedioxythiophene): Poly(styrenesulfonate) (PEDOT : PSS) |
| Poly[2-methoxy-5-(2-ethylhexyloxy)-1,4-phenylenevinylene] (PC71BM) |
